prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Has Stefan come to a decision of whether or not to include me, romantically, in his life, if so what is his decision?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the catalog of data as it appears in the horary chart for your question, noted strictly by horary principles:

1. Significators and House Placement
 • Melissa (the Ascendant):
  – Ascendant at 16° Cancer
  – Mars in Cancer (r) is conjunct the Ascendant
  – The ruler of Cancer (Moon) is present at 11° Aries, positioned in the 10th House (which contains Moon, Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron)
 • Stefan (represented by his 9th house via the cross‐reference):
  – His significator comes from the chart’s 6th House, with the cusp at 15° Sagittarius
  – The traditional ruler of Sagittarius is Jupiter; Jupiter is at 11° Gemini and located in the 11th House (per the house listing)

2. Planetary Positions
 • Sun: 14° Aquarius
 • Moon: 11° Aries
 • Mercury: 9° Aquarius
 • Venus: 28° Pisces
 • Mars (r): 19° Cancer
 • Jupiter (r): 11° Gemini
 • Saturn: 17° Pisces
 • Uranus: 23° Taurus
 • Neptune: 28° Pisces
 • Pluto: 2° Aquarius
 • North Node (r): 29° Pisces
 • Chiron: 19° Aries

3. Aspects (with listed orbs)
 • Moon sextile Jupiter; orb 0°
 • Mars square Chiron; orb 0°
 • MC opposition IC; orb 0°
 • Venus conjunct Neptune; orb 0°
 • Uranus sextile MC; orb 1°
 • Neptune conjunct North Node; orb 1°
 • Venus conjunct North Node; orb 1°
 • Uranus trine IC; orb 1°
 • Saturn trine Ascendant; orb 1°
 • Moon sextile Mercury; orb 2°
 • Mars trine Saturn; orb 2°
 • Mercury trine Jupiter; orb 2°
 • Pluto sextile North Node; orb 3°
 • Sun sextile Moon; orb 3°
 • Chiron square Ascendant; orb 3°
 • Mars conjunction Ascendant; orb 3°
 • Sun trine Jupiter; orb 3°
 • Mars sextile Uranus; orb 4°
 • Venus sextile Pluto; orb 4°
 • Neptune opposition IC; orb 4°
 • Venus opposition IC; orb 4°
 • Neptune conjunct MC; orb 4°
 • Venus conjunct MC; orb 4°
 • Uranus sextile Neptune; orb 5°
 • Mars sextile IC; orb 5°
 • Venus sextile Uranus; orb 5°
 • Sun sextile Chiron; orb 5°
 • Moon square Ascendant; orb 5°
 • Sun conjunction Mercury; orb 5°
 • Mars trine MC; orb 5°
 • Saturn sextile Uranus; orb 6°
 • Jupiter square Saturn; orb 6°
 • Saturn opposition IC; orb 7°
 • Saturn conjunct MC; orb 7°
 • Mercury conjunct Pluto; orb 7°
 • Moon conjunct Chiron; orb 8°
 • Ascendant trine MC; orb 8°
 • Pluto trine IC; orb 8°

4. Patterns and Chart Structure
 • Stellium in Pisces is evident through Venus, Neptune, Saturn, and the North Node along with the MC in Pisces
 • A multiple opposition is present between the MC in Pisces and the IC (in Virgo), involving Neptune, Saturn, and Venus
 • Two “Cradle” configurations are noted:
  – One includes Venus, the IC, Mars, Uranus, Neptune, and the MC
  – The second involves Saturn, the IC, Mars, and Uranus
 • The overall chart shape is a Bowl, with most planets gathered in the top right quadrant and the bottom right quadrant empty
 • The water element is dominant among the inner planets, while no inner planet is placed in an Earth sign
 • The Moon is a waxing crescent, an indicator of a developing situation
 • Mars appears on the Ascendant, and there is a mutual reception noted between the Moon in Aries and Mars in Cancer

This listing compiles all the chart data—planetary positions, house placements for both Melissa and Stefan’s significators, aspects with orbs, notable patterns, and chart shape—that will serve as the basis for the horary interpretation of whether Stefan has reached a decision regarding including you romantically.

This listing compiles all the chart data—planetary positions, house placements for both Melissa and Stefan’s significators, aspects with orbs, notable patterns, and chart shape—that will serve as the basis for the horary interpretation of whether Stefan has reached a decision regarding including you romantically.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the signals in your horary, key indicators for Stefan’s decision include the benefic aspects between your significator and his—especially the Moon sextile Jupiter (orb 0°) and Mercury trine Jupiter (orb 2°). His significator Jupiter, residing in Gemini in the 11th House (reflecting his social or external influences) carries a retrograde tone that may suggest hesitation, but its connection with your Ascendant ruler (the Moon, even though positioned in Aries on the Midheaven) implies a leaning toward engagement.

Additional factors—such as Mars on your Ascendant in Cancer, reflecting determination but also vulnerability (notably its square to Chiron)—indicate that while a decision appears made, it comes with complexities. The prominent stellium in Pisces (with Venus, Neptune, Saturn, and the North Node in mutual presence on the MC) adds a layer of public or external pressure that could affect his internal conflict between his established commitments and this emerging attraction.

Thus, the chart’s configuration supports that Stefan has reached a decision leaning toward including you romantically. However, his decision is likely intertwined with caution and marked by an internal struggle to balance differing priorities.

Thus, the chart’s configuration supports that Stefan has reached a decision leaning toward including you romantically. However, his decision is likely intertwined with caution and marked by an internal struggle to balance differing priorities.

mes: My apologies, I don't exactly understand. Can you be more direct, please?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: Stefan's chart indicates a decision favoring a romantic inclusion of you. His benefic aspects—such as the Moon sextile Jupiter and Mercury trine Jupiter—show clear support for engagement, while a few tension indicators, like Mars square Chiron, suggest that this inclusion comes with notable internal reservation and complexity. In short, he has decided to pursue a romantic connection, though expect that his actions may be cautious and evolve slowly.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you. I have another question. Are there any timing indicators in the chart that allude to when his decision will be communicated to me?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: The Moon’s status as a waxing crescent and its positive aspects to key planets indicate that communication is on the horizon. Specifically, the Moon in Aries and its involvement in close aspects—such as the sextile to Jupiter—imply an emerging development that tends to resolve within days to a couple of weeks. Although a retrograde Jupiter suggests a slight internal delay on his side, the overall configuration supports that his decision will be communicated within a 7-to-14-day window.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you. Now that you've given me the interpretation of the chart can you show me the aspects and chart elements along with how they support the interpretation and conclusion? I'm trying to learn Horary Astrology at the same time as I utilize it as a guide.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a breakdown of the specific aspects and chart elements that support the interpretation, with explanations linked to horary principles:

1. Significators and House Placements
 • Melissa is represented by the Ascendant (16° Cancer) with Mars (r) in Cancer conjunct the Ascendant.
  – This placement indicates determination on your part and highlights the strong physical and emotional activation of your query.
 • Stefan is indicated by the 9th house significator. Using the cross-reference guide, his area connects to the 6th house in your chart (starting at 15° Sagittarius).
  – The traditional rulers come into play here (Jupiter for Sagittarius). Jupiter’s placement and aspects will therefore provide insights regarding his motives and timing.

2. Key Benefic Aspects Involving Jupiter
 • Moon Sextile Jupiter (orb 0°):
  – The Moon here represents the day-to-day developments and responsiveness.
  – Its sextile to Jupiter, the ruler of Stefan’s represented house, is a positive indicator. The tight orb demonstrates a timely and fortuitous connection suggesting that his decision is favorably inclined.
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb 2°):
  – Mercury, as a communicator, in harmonious trine with Jupiter confirms that messages regarding his decisions are likely to be transmitted calmly and clearly.
  – This interaction reinforces the conclusion that communication regarding his decision is set in motion.

3. Tension Aspects Reflecting Internal Conflict
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 0°):
  – Mars on the Ascendant, while giving energy and assertiveness, squares Chiron—which symbolizes a wound or sensitive point.
  – This aspect implies that while the decision is leaning toward romance, there is an underlying complexity or hesitancy (perhaps related to his internal reservations or past wounds).
  – The square marks that although the decision is being made, its expression or implementation may be cautious and not entirely smooth.

4. Chart Structure and Overall Configuration
 • Stellium in Pisces surrounding the MC (with Venus, Neptune, Saturn, and North Node in Pisces):
  – This concentration at the Midheaven underscores the external or public dimension of the decision; there may be outer influences such as social expectations or public reputation playing a role.
 • The Bowl-shaped chart:
  – With most planets clustered in the top right quadrant, the energy in your chart indicates a focused outcome with clear directional momentum.
 • The Moon’s status as a waxing crescent:
  – In horary terms, a waxing phase signifies the beginning of development – hinting that the decision will soon be communicated but is still in the process of unfolding.
 • Retrograde Jupiter:
  – While generally benefic, its retrograde motion may add an internal delay or reflective quality. This supports the idea that, though the decision is positive, his inner process is undergoing careful revision before final communication.

5. Timing Indicators
 • The Moon’s involvement in favorable aspects (sextile Jupiter and its placement in Aries) suggests an emergent resolution.
  – In horary charts, such lunar signals often point to developments occurring within days to a couple of weeks.
 • Jupiter’s aspects with both the Moon (sextile) and Mercury (trine) point to a progression toward expression of the decision; these are timing markers for when communication will be effective.

Summary of Support:
• The beneficial aspects (Moon sextile Jupiter, Mercury trine Jupiter) provide evidence that the cosmic energies are aligning toward clarity and communication regarding the decision.
• The tension introduced by Mars square Chiron indicates that while the outcome is positive toward including you romantically, the process may be accompanied by internal complexity or slow resolution, hence a cautious but forthcoming message.
• The overall planetary pattern, including the Pisces stellium at the MC and the bowl-shaped chart, reinforces that public influences and external pressures play a role in both his decision and the timing in which he reveals it.

This step-by-step analysis of each horary element and aspect should clarify how the chart data supports the interpretation and conclusion.
